edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file
Class SampleTemplateFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.SampleSentenceData
      edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.SampleTemplateFactory
public class SampleTemplateFactory
extends SampleSentenceData

Maintains a collection of templates associated with synsets. These templates are used to provide examples of how words are used and in what context(s) their use is appropriate.

As of WordNet 3.0, templates are available only for verb synsets.

See Also:
Format of WordNet database files ("Verb Example Sentences")

getSample

public String getSample(SynsetType type,
                        String key)
                 throws RetrievalException
Returns the sentence template associated with a particular synset type and key value.

Parameters:
type - Synset type for which to return the sentence template.
key - Key value of the sentence to be returned.
Returns:
Sentence template associated with the specified type and key.
Throws:
RetrievalException - An error occurred reading the frame text file.
